urlset.script: { "@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "LocalBusiness", "name": "GRM Custom Cuts", "url": "https://grmcuts.com", "sameAs":"https://grmcuts.com", "openingHoursSpecification": [ { "@type": "OpeningHoursSpecification", "dayOfWeek": [ "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday", "Saturday" ], "opens": "09:00", "closes": "17:00" } ], "address": { "@type": "PostalAddress", "streetAddress": "San Francisco,Carmelita St", "addressLocality": "Philippines General Trias, Cavite", "addressRegion": "4A Calabarzon", "postalCode": "4107", "addressCountry": "PH" }, "geo": { "@type": "GeoCoordinates", "latitude": 14.303956, "longitude": 120.914042 }, "priceRange":"Depend", "description": "We Create Customize Dress Base On Your Preference", "email": "mailto:info@grmcuts.com", "telephone":"xxxx-xxx-xxxx", "image": [ "https://example.com/photos/1x1/photo.jpg", "https://example.com/photos/4x3/photo.jpg", "https://example.com/photos/16x9/photo.jpg" ] }
